item.title: Headset/ Boom Microphones Headset Boom Microphones – Captain’s and First Officer

numlitem.para: Associated hand microphone is installed and operative,
Flight Data Recorder (FDR) is operative, and
Repairs are made within three flight days.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel "BOOM MICROPHONE(S) INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
